== Main Inclusion Report for bluez-gnome ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/b/bluez-gnome, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Needed as a passkey agent for Bluetooth.
** Intended to go to `supported` seed.
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** No <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/pkgreport.cgi?src=bluez-gnome|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>
** Good contact with Debian maintainer.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Packaging: standard CDBS package.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
